channel.title: Propose downstream on Packit Service Status

item.title: [Resolved] Fedora infrastructure authentication problem
item.description: There is a problem with authentication in Fedora Infrastructure, leading to failures of jobs that interact with it (mostly propose_downstream, pull_from_upstream, koji_build, bodhi_update) as Packit is unable to authenticate. To stay updated on the root cause of this problem, please track this issue. The problem should be now resolved. You can retrigger the failed jobs by: /packit propose-downstream comment in any upstream issue /packit pull-from-upstream / /packit koji-build / /packit create-update comment in any dist-git pull-request
item.content:
There is a problem with authentication in Fedora Infrastructure, leading to failures of jobs that interact with it (mostly propose_downstream, pull_from_upstream, koji_build, bodhi_update) as Packit is unable to authenticate. To stay updated on the root cause of this problem, please track this issue.

The problem should be now resolved. You can retrigger the failed jobs by:

  • /packit propose-downstream comment in any upstream issue
  • /packit pull-from-upstream / /packit koji-build / /packit create-update comment in any dist-git pull-request
